name: MiniMap Kingdom
description:
Developer's words



This is a game I developed independently from design to program maintenance,
First of all, I want to thank all the players who participated in the production,
It's your feedback that allows the game to be constantly revised and optimized, and has grown up to this day.
In development, I have reduced the consumption of animation and rendering as much as possible to increase the number of units,
This turns【MiniMap Kingdom】into a minimalist image game,
For players who like gorgeous graphics and shocking content,
The game may lack a little charm,
But if you like sandbox observation, base construction, city defense games,
Find a quiet night and buy it for easy play,
I believe you can still find some fun in it.
(っ´ω`c)

Simple kingdom simulation game



In the game, the character will play a role similar to a king or God,
You can freely change plots, construct buildings and production units,
And the game has an infinitely large and automatically generated map that can be expanded,
The strength of the enemy will gradually increase with the number of days survival,
The player's unit will also be upgraded as the player's "divine power" level increases,
In addition, each unit also has independent experience and level,
The building will automatically produce the unit, and the unit will automatically move and change the plot to obtain resources,
After the enemy has occupied the player’s building,
They will start collecting resources to produce more enemies,
Most of the time players only need to play the role of an observer,
It’s easy to play but it can also make people spend a lot of time on it,
Hope you can enjoy the game.
(っ´ω`c)

Long-term development



The basic structure of the minimap kingdom has been established,
I hope to add more units and content in the future,
And continue to optimize the effectiveness of the game to accommodate more units,
Reduce the problem of late game jams,
I will also spend time rewriting the game’s architecture when necessary,
Players’ gaming experience will be very helpful for development,
I will gradually adjust the direction of development with these feedbacks,
Hope that eventually the minimap kingdom can be turned into a simple, fun and long-lasting game,
Thank you for your participation!
(っ´ω`c)
